title: Doi Kham
description: Part of chain natural and health foods store; has 2 locations in Hat Yai. Large space stocking a wide range of products - from shampoo and personal care product to foodstuff like grains, beans, dried foods, whole grain breads, and other foods you'd expect to find in health food stores. Offers a small selection of organic fruits and vegetables from the King's Projects in Chiang Mai. Prices are more than other stores but the quality is good.
